["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"安装基础包","children":"安装基础包"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先安装提供基础配置文件和 GPG 密钥的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"rpmfusion-*.rpm"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"fedora-用户","children":"Fedora 用户"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum install --nogpgcheck http://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm http://download1.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或者如下直接用镜像中的 rpm 包："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum install --nogpgcheck {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"centosrhel-用户","children":"CentOS/RHEL 用户"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["CentOS/RHEL 8",{"version":"8"}],["CentOS/RHEL 9",{"version":"9"}]]}],"code":"{{sudo}}yum localinstall --nogpgcheck {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/free/el/rpmfusion-free-release-{{version}}.noarch.rpm {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/nonfree/el/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-{{version}}.noarch.rpm"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"修改链接指向镜像站","children":"修改链接指向镜像站"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["安装成功后，使用以下命令修改 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/"}]," 目录下以 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"rpmfusion"}]," 开头，以 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":".repo"}]," 结尾的文件："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}sed -e 's!^metalink=!#metalink=!g' \
         -e 's!^mirrorlist=!#mirrorlist=!g' \
         -e 's!^#baseurl=!baseurl=!g' \
         -e 's!https\?://download1\.rpmfusion\.org/!{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/!g' \
         -i.bak /etc/yum.repos.d/rpmfusion*.repo","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["以 Fedora 下的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/rpmfusion-free.repo"}]," 为例，替换后的文件类似如下："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[rpmfusion-free]
name=RPM Fusion for Fedora $releasever - Free
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/free/fedora/releases/$releasever/Everything/$basearch/os/
#metalink=https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/metalink?repo=free-fedora-$releasever&arch=$basearch
enabled=1
metadata_expire=14d
type=rpm-md
gpgcheck=1
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-rpmfusion-free-fedora-$releasever

[rpmfusion-free-debuginfo]
name=RPM Fusion for Fedora $releasever - Free - Debug
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/free/fedora/releases/$releasever/Everything/$basearch/debug/
#metalink=https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/metalink?repo=free-fedora-debug-$releasever&arch=$basearch
enabled=0
metadata_expire=7d
type=rpm-md
gpgcheck=1
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-rpmfusion-free-fedora-$releasever

[rpmfusion-free-source]
name=RPM Fusion for Fedora $releasever - Free - Source
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/free/fedora/releases/$releasever/Everything/source/SRPMS/
#metalink=https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/metalink?repo=free-fedora-source-$releasever&arch=$basearch
enabled=0
metadata_expire=7d
type=rpm-md
gpgcheck=1
repo_gpgcheck=0
gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-rpmfusion-free-fedora-$releasever","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"更多","children":"更多"}],"
